import './index.scss' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm('gmail', 'template_YeJhZkgb', form.current, 'your-token') .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return (

Contact Me!

) } export default Contact;
